EmailTemplate.name: Work Item Assignment
EmailTemplate.Body: #if ($requesterName) $requesterName #{else} The system #{end} has assigned the following work item to you: $workItemName.
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying work item assignee that they have been assigned a work item.

Argument.name: item
Argument.Description: The WorkItem that is being reassigned.

Argument.name: workItemName
Argument.Description: The description property of the WorkItem.

Argument.name: requesterName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that requested the assignment.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Work item assigned: $workItemName
